name: Oath of Redemption
description: Paladins on this path use violence only as a last resort, striving to bring peace and redemption to their foes.

3.name: Emissary of Peace
3.description: As a bonus action, gain a +5 bonus to Persuasion checks for 10 minutes.

3.name: Rebuke the Violent
3.description: When an attacker within 30 feet deals damage, use your reaction to force a Wisdom save; on a failure the attacker takes radiant damage equal to the damage it dealt, half on success.

7.name: Aura of the Guardian
7.description: When a creature within 10 feet takes damage, you can use your reaction to take that damage instead.

15.name: Protective Spirit
15.description: If you end your turn in combat with fewer than half your hit points, you regain 1d6 + half your paladin level hit points.

20.name: Emissary of Redemption
20.description: You have resistance to all damage from creatures, and whenever a creature hits you it takes radiant damage equal to half the damage you take, unless you harmed it.
